brief.title: The Brief
brief.section1_content: L8P builds feedback loops between people and AI. We turn real communities into learning systems—closing the loop between human insight and machine intelligence.
brief.section2_p1: Most AI systems are trained once and deployed. They don't learn from the communities they serve. The feedback loop is broken.
brief.section2_p2: Communities have deep, contextual knowledge that AI can't replicate. But that knowledge stays trapped in conversations, never feeding back into the systems that serve them.
brief.section3_intro: We build three types of feedback loops:
brief.section3_events_desc: Structured gatherings where community knowledge surfaces and gets captured
brief.section3_research_desc: Deep investigations into how communities learn and share knowledge
brief.section3_tools_desc: Systems that make feedback loops explicit and actionable
brief.section4_p1: AI is getting cheaper and faster. But it's not getting smarter about communities. The gap between what AI can do and what communities need is widening.
brief.section4_p2: We're building the infrastructure to close that gap—one loop at a time.
